name: Lode Runner II
overview: Lode Runner II (disk version) is an almost 1:1 copy of Lode Runner, but with 104 completely new fan-created levels (from 4711-Soft). The colour of the bricks was changed from red to blue. Take note that there is also a defect image of this version on the internet, with only 21 playable levels - the levels 22 upwards were overwritten with other data.
